beak.methods.som.load_csv module

Created on Thu Jul 25 11:50:45 2019 Script for loading csv input data files @author: shautala

beak.methods.som.load_csv.load_csv_file(input_file)[source]

Load CSV input file

Parameters:

input_file (str) – full file path to csv file holding the data

Returns:

Dictionary holding data as ndarray and meta data (number of rows and columns, column names, file type, input file name)

Return type:

dict

beak.methods.som.load_csv.read_csv_coordinate_columns(csv_header)[source]

Read coordinate columns from dictionary when input file is csv

Parameters:

csv_header (dict) – Dictionary holding data as ndarray and meta data (number of rows and columns, column names, file type, input file name)

Returns:

Dictionary holding coordinate columns as ndarray and column names

Return type:

dict

beak.methods.som.load_csv.read_csv_data_columns(csv_header)[source]

Read coordinate columns from dictionary when input file is csv

Parameters:

csv_header (dict) – dictionary holding the data as a ndarray and meta data, such as numer of rows and column, column (data) names, file type

Returns:

Dictionary holding data columns as ndarray and column names

Return type:

dict

beak.methods.som.load_csv._read_columns(csv_header, columns, fmt='')[source]

Read columns from dictionary

Parameters:

  • csv_header (dict) – dictionary holding the data as a ndarray and meta data

  • columns (list[int]) – list of columns to return

  • fmt (str, optional) – format. Defaults to ‘’.

Raises:

TypeError – Invalid type: columns must be a list or tuple

Returns:

dictionary holding selected data columns as a ndarray, column names and format

Return type:

dict

beak.methods.som.load_csv.read_csv_header(input_file)[source]

Read metadata from files of csv file format

Parameters:

input_file (str) – input file path

Returns:

dictionary holding meta data from input file, such as input file name, number of rows and columns, column (data) names, file type

Return type:

dict
